name: Project Tundmatu
description:
Mysterious wormhole appears near to the earth and people begin to disappear.

The adventurer of the galaxy is called for help to
solve the mystery of the wormhole and missing people.
And as always, everything doesn’t go as planned…

Controls:
Move and aim: Arrow keys
Jump: Z
shoot: X
map: V
Activate: C
Weapon: A & S

Supports Xbox 360 controller

Game is work in progress and will include bugs etc.

Game is powered by GDevelop
